channel.title: Game does not work
channel.description: I just downloaded Black Mesa and when I go to play it, a Steam error pops up and says it failed to start (missing executable) I want to play this so bad and I don't want to wait for Steam to release it. Please help:'(

item.title: Game does not work
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Did you follow the Installation Manual? If you did, check out the Troubleshooting FAQ.

Read full topic
